document_data.name: Caligarde
document_data.mainbody: '''Caligarde''' was a [[mage]] who studied the [[arcane]] arts under the [[Seven Wizards]] of [[Myth Drannor]], survived the fall of the city and went on to become a spell inventor of note.
document_data.History: After the destruction of Myth Drannor, Caligarde developed a hatred for [[elves]], to the point where he hunted down every elven [[mage]] he caught off-guard. During this time, he took on many [[human]] apprentices who shared his ruthlessness.
